Content.Text:
<NAME_MOB_MARCHAIS>
I came here to shop, but there's nothing in
particular I want to buy. Oh well, maybe next
time.

<NAME_MOB_MARCHAIS>
To make a profit, I have to buy good products
cheap. I think I might be able to manage that
today.

<NAME_MOB_MARCHAIS>
I bought a lot of good stuff today! Now to haul it
all back to my town.

<NAME_MOB_MARCHAIS>
This town's gotten so famous these days. Me,
I've been coming here since I was little, so it's
great to see how much the place has grown.

<NAME_MOB_MARCHAIS>
This town's guild has done a lot for me.

<NAME_MOB_MARCHAIS>
Right, now to use all my marketing know-how
to make a nice profit...
